goal: I want to track a specific property at 1800 Pearl Street, Boulder, CO. On Zilloft, find its last sale date. Then, create an all-day event on my GoCalendar for that same date but for next year, titled 'Review Property Value: 1800 Pearl' to remind me to check its appreciation.
